===Alternative forms===
There are minor differences in where the last stroke of the top component (top-left to bottom-right diagonal) starts – on the second horizontal stroke or on the third.

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|艹|t1=grass|屯|t2=sprout|日|t3=sun|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|c3=s}}.

The character {{lang|zh|春}} itself is probably a variant of {{och-l|屯}} as they are equivalent for the meaning “spring” in Old Chinese literature.
